scripts.build: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.postinstall: pip install pymongo selenium python-dotenv python-dateutil && node -e "const os = require('os'); if (os.platform() === 'win32') { require('child_process').execSync('curl -o chromedriver-win64.zip https://storage.googleapis.com/chrome-for-testing-public/131.0.6778.204/win64/chromedriver-win64.zip && tar -xf chromedriver-win64.zip && move chromedriver-win64\chromedriver.exe .\ && del chromedriver-win64.zip', { stdio: 'inherit' }); } else { require('child_process').execSync('curl -o chromedriver-linux64.zip https://storage.googleapis.com/chrome-for-testing-public/131.0.6778.204/linux64/chromedriver-linux64.zip && unzip chromedriver-linux64.zip && mv chromedriver-linux64/chromedriver /usr/local/bin/chromedriver && chmod +x /usr/local/bin/chromedriver', { stdio: 'inherit' }); }"
